categories.name: Sales Track Record
categories.criteria: Proven quota attainment, revenue growth, deal size experience, ability to scale sales in similar stage/company.
sample_questions: Describe your biggest sales achievements (e.g., revenue grown, quotas exceeded).
What deal sizes have you closed, and in what markets?
Tell me about a time you turned around an underperforming territory/team.

categories.name: Leadership & Team Building
categories.criteria: Experience building/scaling teams, hiring, retaining top talent, fostering high-performance culture.
sample_questions: How have you built and scaled sales teams from scratch?
Describe your approach to hiring A-players.

categories.name: Strategic Thinking & GTM Execution
categories.criteria: Ability to develop sales strategy, align with product/marketing, forecast accurately, adapt to market changes.
sample_questions: Walk me through a sales strategy you designed and executed.
How do you build forecasting models?
Describe adapting strategy during economic downturns.

categories.name: Coaching & Development
categories.criteria: Mentoring reps, improving performance, building pipelines, deal coaching.
sample_questions: How do you coach reps on deals?
Give an example of developing a rep into a top performer.
What metrics do you track for team development?

categories.name: Communication & Influence
categories.criteria: Clear articulation, executive presence, cross-functional collaboration.
sample_questions: Present a mock sales pitch for our product.
How do you influence non-sales stakeholders?
Describe communicating bad news (e.g., missed quarter).

categories.name: Cultural Fit & Motivation
categories.criteria: Alignment with company values, passion for the mission, resilience, self-awareness.
sample_questions: Why do you want this role/company?
Tell me about a failure and what you learned.
